Service Details: - Collects shoes and makes them available for free to clients of many agencies in Kelowna, including the Kelowna Food Bank- Operates out of the Sunrise Rotary Shoe Bank across from the Kelowna Food Bank on Ellis St- Cients of twenty local agencies are able to pick up a pair of shoes or boots every three months- Those that are not needed locally are sent around the world to people who are in need of shoes
